Oyakata holds session:
On Fri, 20 Aug 2004 07:59:31 -0000, Kitsuno$B$5$s(B wrote:
>In a japanese history book I am reading it seems to refer to Takeda 
>Katsuyori $BIp(B"c$B>!Mj(B as $BIp(B"c$B?.Mj(B which I
>guess would be something 
>like "Nobuyori" - is this a misprint, or was this his name at one 
>point?
>
It does not appear that $B?.Mj(B was one of the names used by Katsuyori. 
There was a Takeda Nobuyori, son of Nobutake $B?.Ip(B - but Nobutake died 
in 1359 so this Nobuyori could not the same as Katsuyori.

Other than just a regular old typo, another possibility is that it 
might not be a name but just the word $B?.Mj(B - that is, trust, believe, 
depend on, etc.

--
